snippet: Ramunas Navardauskas of Lithuania took the lead in the Giro d’Italia after his Garmin-Barracuda squad won the team time trial in the fourth stage in Verona.
abstract: Lithuanian cyclist Ramunas Navardauskas takes the overall lead after the fourth stage of the Giro d'Italia bicycle race.
lead_paragraph: Ramunas Navardauskas of Lithuania took the lead in the Giro d’Italia after his Garmin-Barracuda squad won the team time trial in the fourth stage in Verona.

headline.seo: Ramunas Navardauskas Takes Lead in Giro d’Italia
